dict.acceptation: (it的反身形式)；它自己，它本身；自身，本身；

sent.orig: Love gives naught but itself and takes naught but from itself.
sent.trans: 爱除了自身别无所予，除了自身别无所取。

sent.orig: Itself of science and technology is neuter, the key depends on human itself.
sent.trans: 科学技术本身是中性的，关键在于人类本身。

sent.orig: The process of evolution gathers itself up ceaselessly and remakes itself again in time.
sent.trans: 进化的过程不断地集中力量，一次次及时地再造自己。

sent.orig: Any kingdom divided against itself will be ruined, and a house divided against itself will fall.
sent.trans: 凡一国自相分争，就成为荒场。凡一家自相分争，就必败落。

sent.orig: And so It could and would, never know Itself from a reference point outside of Itself.
sent.trans: 因为他永远无法、永远不会由外在，以他自己的一个参考点去认识他自己。
